Text: Hi Thanks again for the upload. Just a small comment I think it would be less confusing if the name of your file is matching the date you announced on the torrent name. The torrent name has the US airing date and the file itself has the canadian airing date.
Or, simply title it with the Canadian date, perhaps? And if it's the Canadian ep, any chance of getting it after it airs? If not, no bother. We're grateful just to be getting it here in Australia.
